tool_description: Get and search for UFO sightings and recent images and videos captured by experiencers
name: UFO Sightings
title: UFO Sightings

api_list.name: Event Statistics
api_list.description: Enter a sighting id (as found using one of the other endpoints) and a radius in km to see statistics about other sightings within the same region

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: The radius from the sighting in km

api_list.name: Event
api_list.description: Get more info about a specific sighting based on an id that can be found using one of the other endpoints
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufo-sightings.p.rapidapi.com/event/87250"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufo-sightings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufo-sightings.p.rapidapi.com/event/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufo-sightings.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Media
api_list.description: Return images and videos users have submitted.

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Enter any search term i.e location, dates, keywords, text, sighting ids.

api_list.name: Recent Sightings
api_list.description: Sightings sorted by date order starting with the most recent.
